dc_title_s: Plat book of Schoolcraft Co., Michigan
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 atlas (37 leaves) | Abstract: Atlas of township property maps showing names of rural landowners. | Notes: Scale determined from section lines.|Date estimated by history of M-28, M-94, and M-98.|Title on cover: "Plat book of" printed with "Schoolcraft Co Michigan" handwritten below. | Scale approximately 1:51,000
